name: Mallory and the Marble Sanctum
description:
Explore a mysterious labyrinth on the edge of nowhere and find out if you're really as alone in it as you appear to be. An early pre-alpha demo for Mallory, a story-driven adventure game currently in solo development as a pet project.

Platforms: Windows, 64-bit only
Languages: English, Russian
Playtime: around 30-40 minutes
Made by: Ivan Khoroshev (@devancheque)
Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/BshQCFFwBz
